    • expandExit

      private void expandExit()
      Checks this is the north or the south first. Then iterate for all the appropriate x coordinates and call expandExitFromHere with appropriate x and y

    • expandExitFromHere

      private void expandExitFromHere​(Location here, int x, int y, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String hotKey)

      Parameters:
      here - the current location
      x - X coordinate
      y - Y coordinate
      name - name of the Exit
      hotKey - the hotkey for the appropiate Action
